title: Extended the framework for the Russian Vine. siv #18

tasks.task: Farmer maintains and repairs a chicken coop and surrounding area.
subtasks: Releasing chickens from the coop.
Checking for eggs in the coop.
Removing barrier mesh near the pond.
Feeding and tending to ducks.
Pruning Russian vine overgrowth.
Constructing a support framework for the Russian vine.
Securing chicken wire mesh to the framework.
Dealing with bee interference in the pond area.
Addressing potential structural weaknesses in the vine's trellis.
